          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["You can also provide an "],
              ["else", [["c"]]],
              [" block or an "],
              ["ensure", [["c"]]],
              [" block. An "],
              ["else", [["c"]]],
              [" block will be executed when the "],
              ["begin", [["c"]]],
              [" block completes without an exception thrown. An "],
              ["ensure", [["c"]]],
              [" block will always be executed. An "],
              ["ensure", [["c"]]],
              [" block is analogous to a "],
              ["finally", [["c"]]],
              [" block in a curly brace language like C# or Java."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
